themes: affordability of studio spaces for artists
need for direct financial support (stipends/grants) for emerging artists
comparison to successful models in other cities (GCAC in Ohio)
desire for more public and mural art events
interest in innovative art forms (3D projections, animations)
key_phrases: difficult it is to find studio spaces in Austin
Average rental cost is close to $1000
Could ACME support up and coming artists with studio or material stipends
GCAC (Greatest Columbus Arts Council) would provide $1200 grants to over 200 emerging artists annually
orgs will fund virtual or public mural events where artists are paid a stipend
barriers_identified: high rental costs for studio spaces
solutions_proposed: ACME support up and coming artists with studio or material stipends through annual grant applications
facilitate more mural events where artists are paid a stipend
fund virtual or public mural events including 3D projected illustrations and animations
